original_text: Many of the people who listened to Peter believed his message. So the apostles baptized those people. About three thousand people who now believed in Jesus joined the group that same day.
korean_text: 그 말을 받은 사람들은 세례를 받으매 이 날에 신도의 수가 삼천이나 더하더라

sentences.original_text: Many of the people who listened to Peter
So the apostles baptized those people
joined the group that same day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 같은 날에 그 그룹에 합류했습니다
